taskbody.context: To create a new Design Studio (DS) project:

step.cmd: On the menu bar, click File Project .
step.stepresult: The New Project dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: Select Design Studio Design Studio Model Project .
step.stepresult: The New Design Studio Model Project dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: In the Project Name field, type the name of the new project as follows: <project name>-models.
(Optional) If you want to change the default location where the project will be saved, uncheck the box Use default location and click Browse to select a new location.
Click Finish to create the project.
step.stepresult: Your new DS project is displayed in the DS Navigator view pane.
